TypeSignature.Value: public interface IDOMImplementation : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IDOMImplementation implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IDOMImplementation = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: The DOMImplementation interface provides a number of methods for performing operations that are independent of any particular instance of the document object model.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public Org.W3c.Dom.IDocument CreateDocument (string namespaceURI, string qualifiedName, Org.W3c.Dom.IDocumentType doctype);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Org.W3c.Dom.IDocument CreateDocument(string namespaceURI, string qualifiedName, class Org.W3c.Dom.IDocumentType doctype) cil managed
abstract member CreateDocument : string * string * Org.W3c.Dom.IDocumentType -> Org.W3c.Dom.IDocument

Docs.param: The namespace URI of the document element to create or null.
The qualified name of the document element to be created or null.
The type of document to be created or null. When doctype is not null, its Node.ownerDocument attribute is set to the document being created.
Docs.summary: Creates a DOM Document object of the specified type with its document element.
Docs.returns: A new Document object with its document element. If the NamespaceURI, qualifiedName, and doctype are null, the returned Document is empty with no document element.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception:
INVALID_CHARACTER_ERR: Raised if the specified qualified name is not an XML name according to [XML 1.0].
NAMESPACE_ERR: Raised if the qualifiedName is malformed, if the qualifiedName has a prefix and the namespaceURI is null, or if the qualifiedName is null and the namespaceURI is different from null, or if the qualifiedName has a prefix that is "xml" and the namespaceURI is different from " http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" [XML Namespaces] , or if the DOM implementation does not support the "XML" feature but a non-null namespace URI was provided, since namespaces were defined by XML.
WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR: Raised if doctype has already been used with a different document or was created from a different implementation.
NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR: May be raised if the implementation does not support the feature "XML" and the language exposed through the Document does not support XML Namespaces (such as [HTML 4.01]).

MemberSignature.Value: public Org.W3c.Dom.IDocumentType CreateDocumentType (string qualifiedName, string publicId, string systemId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Org.W3c.Dom.IDocumentType CreateDocumentType(string qualifiedName, string publicId, string systemId) cil managed
abstract member CreateDocumentType : string * string * string -> Org.W3c.Dom.IDocumentType

Docs.param: The qualified name of the document type to be created.
Docs.returns: A new DocumentType node with Node.ownerDocument set to null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception:
INVALID_CHARACTER_ERR: Raised if the specified qualified name is not an XML name according to [XML 1.0].
NAMESPACE_ERR: Raised if the qualifiedName is malformed.
NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR: May be raised if the implementation does not support the feature "XML" and the language exposed through the Document does not support XML Namespaces (such as [HTML 4.01]).

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Lang.Object GetFeature (string feature, string version);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Object GetFeature(string feature, string version) cil managed
abstract member GetFeature : string * string -> Java.Lang.Object

Docs.param: The name of the feature requested. Note that any plus sign "+" prepended to the name of the feature will be ignored since it is not significant in the context of this method.
This is the version number of the feature to test.
Docs.summary: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in .
Docs.returns: Returns an object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, if any, or null if there is no object which implements interfaces associated with that feature. If the DOMObject returned by this method implements the DOMImplementation interface, it must delegate to the primary core DOMImplementation and not return results inconsistent with the primary core DOMImplementation such as hasFeature, getFeature, etc.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool HasFeature (string feature, string version);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasFeature(string feature, string version) cil managed
abstract member HasFeature : string * string -> bool

Docs.param: The name of the feature to test.
This is the version number of the feature to test.
Docs.summary: Test if the DOM implementation implements a specific feature and version, as specified in .
Docs.returns: true if the feature is implemented in the specified version, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
